{{cpp/experimental/fs/path/title|stem}}
{{cpp/experimental/fs/path/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=fs_ts|1=
path stem() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the filename identified by the path stripped of its extension.

Returns the substring from the beginning of {{ltt|cpp/experimental/fs/path/filename|filename()}} up to and not including the last period ({{ttb|.}}) character.

If the filename is one of the special filesystem components {{spar|dot}} or {{spar|dot-dot}}, or if it has no periods, the function returns the entire {{ltt|cpp/experimental/fs/path/filename|filename()}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The stem of the filename identified by the path.

{{cpp/impldef exception}}

===Example===
{{example 
|code=
#include &lt;experimental/filesystem&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
namespace fs = std::experimental::filesystem;

int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; fs::path("/foo/bar.txt").stem() &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; fs::path("/foo/.bar").stem() &lt;&lt; '\n';

    for (fs::path p = "foo.bar.baz.tar"; !p.extension().empty(); p = p.stem())
        std::cout &lt;&lt; p.extension() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
 "bar"
""
".tar"
".baz"
".bar"
}}
